title: Bronze 1 Players in series  want ilver 5 but no more time !!!
body:
My friend names is mirobalgaria we played verry hard this nigh and he stay onlly bronze 1 in series 100 lp because the time is to small is 03:10  and we cant play more ranked because he is closed how to he can stay silver 5 help pls  need magic :( :( :( 






                                                                                                                                                          Sorry for my english im bad !!!

replies.body: I think this GAME will suck after 1-2 years because riot do some stupid reworks and updates
Better luck next season to your friend. He'll be stuck in Bronze for a long long time.  Man that really sucks he was so close.

As *Lew* mentioned, once the ranked season ends, there are no do-overs or exceptions that can be made. I'm sorry to hear your friend didn't reach his ranked  goal, but there's nothing we can do to help him hit Silver now.   :(

Let me know if you have any questions.
If the ranked season ended in your region then you won't be able to play any more ranked matches towards end of season rewards.
